title: History of St. Francis de Sales College
content: St. Francis de Sales College (SFS College) was established in 2004 by the Missionaries of St. Francis de Sales (MSFS), a Catholic religious congregation.
The college was started with the aim of providing quality higher education with a focus on academic excellence, character formation, and holistic development.
Located in Electronics City, Bengaluru, the institution has grown over the years, offering various undergraduate and postgraduate programs.
The college follows the core values of the MSFS congregation: Knowledge, Devotion, and Service.
With state-of-the-art infrastructure, dedicated faculty, and a student-centered learning environment, SFS College has established itself as a premier educational institution in the region.
SFS College is affiliated with Bangalore University and recognized for its commitment to innovation, research, and community service.
The institution continues to evolve, shaping young minds and preparing them for successful careers and responsible citizenship.
